channel.title: Exposition on Arpon Raksit
channel.description: Recent content in Exposition on Arpon Raksit

item.title: Smash products & the J-homomorphism
item.description: Constructs a symmetric monoidal structure on the motivic J-homomorphism. One input is a characterization of smash products in terms of the Day convolution product of arrows.

item.title: Complex cobordism: geometry & algebra
item.description: Attempts to convey the miraculous nature of complex cobordism to a fairly broad audience.

item.title: Motivating infinity-categorical thinking
item.description: Describes a few simple ways in which higher category theory can be used to think about classical homotopy theory.

item.title: Characters in global equivariant homotopy theory
item.description: On the generalized character theory of Hopkins-Kuhn-Ravenel and Stapleton.
